sources.title: Town of the Times
sources.description: Ralph Meeker stars in this docudrama which attempts to convice small towns accross middle America to prepare for nuclear holocaust.

metadata.Plot: A "docudrama" produced and distributed by the US government aimed at the authorities in small towns and cities across the United States urging them to be sure to make preparations for protecting their citizens in case of a nuclear attack by the Soviet Union.
metadata.Actors: Ralph Meeker, Larry Gates, Milo Boulton
